column1: As National #HumanTraffickingAwarenessMonth continues I’m glad to see increasing awareness and action in this fight against inhumanity. Last week @GovAbbott declared it a state-recognized month in Texas and the @realDonaldTrump administration visited safe havens in Atlanta. https://t.co/hXtajS6SCm
Happy to be here for the inaugural year in the @DickiesArena celebrating both the heritage and growth of #TX12. As they say this thing is legendary! https://t.co/2tcA7PMOtE
The @FWSSR is an iconic part of Fort Worth. I brought my kids JD Chelsea and Brandon when they were young and it’s still a family tradition. https://t.co/U5v7FClGa6

Today we commemorate the 14th anniversary of Customs and Border Protection’s Air and Marine Operations @CBPAMO. This arm of @CBP is often the first line of border defense spotting threats from air and sea and relaying information to ground agents. https://t.co/fwZHjrRGAE

#TX12 is a place where “community” holds meaning and neighbors help neighbors. I invite you to read my E-Newsletter highlighting just a few of the community service organizations that make me proud to call District 12 home: https://t.co/ZDwMluS3R3 https://t.co/GJv9a9Gr3Q

I applaud @realDonaldTrump for signing Phase One of this historic trade deal between the U.S. and China. America stands strong and our president is holding #China accountable. Texas farmers ranchers and small business owners will benefit! https://t.co/3DR11rCXJw

Congratulations to General Raymond sworn in on this historic day as @SpaceForceCSO. @realDonaldTrump’s vision for @SpaceForceDoD is coming to fruition. We stand by ready to train and equip our Nation's finest -- and to ensure the U.S. continues to dominate in space! https://t.co/P0eLNI8X2v
I cherished our friendship and my words of tribute in 2018 ring true today: https://t.co/SeGMBWEQZY

President George H.W. Bush and First Lady Barbara Bush dedicated their lives to our country and their family -- We were fortunate to see this first-hand in Texas. I am proud to support legislation so the Treasury can issue coins in their honor.
You can subscribe to receive my E-Newsletter by email here: https://t.co/PqPU9f2jwN

The story of Fort Worth is the story of American aviation. This week I was reminded of the tremendous and historic impact our district and great city have had on the nation’s aviation legacy. Read my E-Newsletter for more on this exciting progress: https://t.co/ZDwMluS3R3 https://t.co/t3yFvOXjh4

Proud to partner with the @USAirForce and @FTWAviation Museum to bring the second-ever produced YF-16 -- the prototype of the iconic F-16 that put Fort Worth aerospace on the map -- home to Meacham Field after 46 years! https://t.co/RpSSy1v2ZI
If you suspect someone is being trafficked please call the National Human Trafficking Hotline at (888)-373-7888. (3/3)
As co-chair of the House Anti-Human Trafficking Caucus I have been committed to passing legislation to combat human trafficking and I will continue fighting for this cause. (2/3)

Today is #NationalHumanTraffickingAwarenessDay. North Texas has one of the highest sex trafficking rates in the U.S. because of its relative proximity to the southern border and access to major interstates used to transport victims. (1/3)

Thank you for joining me Secretary McCarthy and thank you for the impressive demo @BellFlight. The best military in the world needs the best aircraft and as @SecArmy said the @USArmy has a friend in Kay Granger. For more: https://t.co/jNtdUinqJh #ArmyModernization @FVLCFT

This week I was proud to show @SecArmy McCarthy the cutting-edge aviation technology produced by @BellFlight in Texas. We visited Bell’s Flight Research Center in Arlington to see innovative Future Vertical Lift aircraft – including the V-280 Valor. https://t.co/3kEKnPUkJU
…@realDonaldTrump has exercised this right following continued aggression by Iran. For more on why I voted no please read my full statement: https://t.co/yRhnvqKsFM (2/2)

Today I cast my vote in strong opposition to the politically-driven War Powers Resolution brought before the House of Representatives. The President of the United States has the constitutional authority to protect Americans when threatened at home or abroad... (1/2) https://t.co/PkMQbGK357

It is great to see careers coming to #TX12 particularly those that increase opportunity for young Texans. @LockheedMartin offers internships through partnerships with local high schools and today recent and soon-to-be college graduates in Fort Worth can interview at a job fair. https://t.co/Wehe1GPv7F
Thank you to our law enforcement who do their best every day to keep our community safe. #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay https://t.co/BZvGGoJeLn

For 17 years I have relied on my Hispanic Advisory Council to make sure I can be their voice on the issues that matter most to the #TX12 community. Thank you all for meeting with me in Fort Worth this week. https://t.co/e2MPwlk8Jo
@LockheedMartin Finally thank you to this talented hard-working group of Texans for keeping our defense industry strong and our nation safe and secure! https://t.co/r9KBXtsRIb

@LockheedMartin It is clear to me on this tour that the most lethal aircraft result from the safest workplace. Thank you @LockheedMartin for continuously improving this world-class facility; over the past five years injuries dropped by more than 15% and injury severity dropped by 22%. https://t.co/3xSvBPM4G4

Next up: the flight line where each aircraft is tested to perfection. @LockheedMartin exceeded delivery goals reduced production costs and had a spectacular safety record in 2019. I’m proud to have supported Lockheed’s efforts with the F-35 program since its beginning. https://t.co/4Zd5Wu6DEW
@LockheedMartin .@LockheedMartin is one of the largest employers in Fort Worth and its F-35 Program provides over 49000 careers and over $9.4 billion to our district alone. https://t.co/IiUTtHszrL

Today I am thrilled to visit @LockheedMartin Aeronautics in Fort Worth including an up-close look at the F-35 production line. The Joint Strike Fighter is the pride of #TX12 and our nation’s military and the program continues to provide thousands of careers to North Texans. https://t.co/7qwnZrIeKq

On January 14 2020 Lt. Hanley celebrates a century of life. To send congratulations and thanks for his service you can mail a card to: Fiske Hanley  C/O Fort Worth Air Power Council  PO Box 8728 Fort Worth Texas  76124

This January a Fort Worth veteran and hero turns 100! U.S. Army First Lieutenant Fiske Hanley served as a B-29 flight engineer in WWII. His aircraft was shot down over Japan but he survived captivity. Lt. Hanley remains an active and beloved part of the Fort Worth community. https://t.co/7rWf91SEpz

A great example of the #casework services my office provides: After 6 months of contacting agencies a veteran had not received his medical records. We advocated for the constituent and got his records so he was able to apply for well-deserved benefits. https://t.co/5ceBkNHpC5

I applaud @realDonaldTrump for taking such decisive action against Iran. Iran’s leaders must understand @realDonaldTrump is prepared to do whatever is necessary to protect the US and American way of life. https://t.co/A63t1JFEIF

I am proud to share my office’s Constituent Services Year in Review! My staff and I are here to serve you. Looking forward to an equally productive 2020. Learn more about constituent services here: https://t.co/5ceBkNHpC5 https://t.co/F3ymtUEtI5

The new year is always a time for optimism and hope. I wish a #HappyNewYear to all in 2020 and look forward to continuing to work for your priorities and values as your voice in Washington. https://t.co/fusEWZuL2W

#TX12 defense industry continues to impress exceeding production goals lowering costs and creating more North Texas careers in 2019. Strong district economy strong national defense! Great news to end the year. https://t.co/lAi1v9dDdF

...we must all search for ways we can participate in making our nation our communities and our gathering places safe again. We also owe our First Responders our love and appreciation as they risk their own lives day after day for all of us. (2/2)

Today each of those touched by the tragedy that unfolded at the West Freeway Church of Christ awoke to a terrible reality. As we continue to hold the families of the victims and members of the congregation in our prayers... (1/2)
Our prayers will be with the family and loved ones of the victims and with the first responders in their heroic efforts. (2/2)

I offer my deepest condolences to the victims and families affected by today’s tragedy at the West Freeway Church of Christ in White Settlement Texas. Evil touched a sacred place of peace and our community shares in your anger and sorrow. (1/2) https://t.co/JOx8ETaxDp

I am so honored to be the 2019 recipient of the Interfaith Chaplaincy Lifetime Award from the @DFWAirport Chapels. This is the largest airport chaplaincy in the world providing comfort and community for travelers away from home. Thank you! https://t.co/0iPSx6fiIs

During this season of giving thanks I am continually grateful for the health of my friend and colleague @RepRonWright. I invite you to read my E-Newsletter about the policies and research that made his cure possible: https://t.co/Lt3NqsImdi https://t.co/KnZilTrlHz

Did you see the stunning White House Christmas wreaths? Happy Holidays and nearly-New Year to the @realDonaldTrump administration. I look forward to getting back to work making meaningful progress together in 2020! https://t.co/lvRo5oR9g5

Merry Christmas! I hope your holiday season is joyful. I ask you to join me in offering a moment of thanks for all service men and women keeping our homes safe and peaceful this #Christmas. https://t.co/NN98HkfEJT

Our community set a poignant record at the Dallas-Fort Worth National Cemetery this year where @WreathsAcross America volunteers laid over 40000 donated wreaths for veterans. For the first time every headstone received a wreath. What a beautiful holiday tribute. https://t.co/HGBIs6j6BM
Congratulations to the @AledoISD Bearcats for bringing home their record 9th football state championship to a proud Texas District 12! https://t.co/zyV5bpv2Xq

I recently learned about an amazing program in Azle called S.W.E.A.T. that gives student drivers with low-level traffic citations the choice to volunteer instead of going to court. I am proud to see local programs strengthening our community. Read more: https://t.co/ZDwMluS3R3 https://t.co/ajdsvjFHPw
Happy first night of #Hanukkah! The @WhiteHouse celebrated early with a beautiful ceremony last week. https://t.co/EjuFy7gc1I

I proudly recognized @CareityF in the Congressional Record for 25 years of fundraising for cancer patients through "Careity Celebrity Cutting." An inspirational U.S. veteran Army Sgt. @DanNevins stole the show at the anniversary event in Fort Worth! https://t.co/lsfahVBudY

@realDonaldTrump This hits close to home in #TX12 after a recent report showed more than half of the state’s severe vaping-related lung injuries happened in North Texas. I will continue working to protect the health our young citizens. https://t.co/B1HnLxm1QN
Thank you @realDonaldTrump for making it tougher for teens to vape by signing a bill that raises the tobacco and e-cigarette purchase age to 21.
@realDonaldTrump Read my full newsletter on #USMCA here: https://t.co/ZDwMluS3R3 And subscribe to stay informed here: https://t.co/ZDwMluS3R3

Today the House passed the United States-Mexico-Canada Trade Agreement #USMCA. @realDonaldTrump is bringing North American trade into the 21st century – a huge win for our #TX12 workers farmers and manufacturers! https://t.co/4yAdxdhLlU
@realDonaldTrump It’s time for the American people to be Congress’ priority again. You can read my remarks from the floor here: https://t.co/yRhnvqKsFM https://t.co/2uEc3UitO9

@realDonaldTrump My vote today is not only against the illegitimate impeachment of @realDonaldTrump — which began not with facts but with a forgone conclusion — it is against House Democrats making a mockery of due process and the rule of law. https://t.co/bzCYNbpWQU

Today I voted against the politically-driven articles of #impeachment. For 3 years Democrats have been unable to accept the voters’ choice to elect @realDonaldTrump using any and all undemocratic means necessary to try and remove him from office. https://t.co/M1Kl0v6Ytf
Read my full statement: https://t.co/yRhnvqKsFM

I am proud that the House passed a strong defense spending bill. I fought to ensure that it supports @realDonaldTrump provides our military with the resources needed to keep this country safe and gives our military families the top-notch care they deserve. https://t.co/TeteAvVn9v

As Republican Leader of @HouseAppropsGOP I’m honored to lead debate today on the House floor on two packages that will fully fund the government and ensure that @realDonaldTrump has the resources he needs to continue the great work he’s doing on behalf of the American people! https://t.co/MlZcbWqBg3
@USDOL @build_youth I'm proud to serve as a champion for the CLC in Washington on behalf of our community. Read my full statement here: https://t.co/yRhnvqKsFM

Congratulations to the Community Learning Center of Fort Worth! Today the @USDOL awarded this dedicated organization $1.1 million for its important YouthBuild program. @Build_Youth creates a path to education and employment for vulnerable young people. https://t.co/qv6LI1HdKm
Learn more about our constituent services and contact my office here: https://t.co/5ceBkNHpC5.

They recently participated in a Casework Roundtable with federal agency representatives to share best practices for “cases“ ranging across veterans education Medicare and social security issues to name just a few. https://t.co/SZVkAmibpG
My experienced district #casework team takes pride in serving constituents to help navigate federal benefits access services and cut through the red tape.

There’s nothing like seeing such happy smiles to put you in the Christmas spirit! I was so pleased to join dedicated volunteers in @CityofAzle Texas to spread a little Angel Tree cheer to families. Thank you to everyone who makes this wonderful tradition possible every year. https://t.co/d41PuMlttR

@MLB @Yankees @RedSox @Rangers I greatly enjoyed connecting with so many constituents while celebrating Mr. Robinson including two bright young women Kailyn and Julianne. Congratulations and #HappyBirthday to a Texas legend. https://t.co/N5Q9K2Ot9Y

It was an honor to help celebrate the 99th birthday of such an accomplished Fort Worthian not only in person but in Congressional Record! Eddie Robinson built a 13 year @MLB  career with the @Yankees @RedSox and six other renowned teams before serving as GM of the @Rangers. https://t.co/zkUGqSRNNt
Had a great meeting with Secretary @EsperDOD this week! We are working hard to ensure our military has the resources they need to keep America safe. https://t.co/NtqCAi7HUY

@RepRonWright @SpeakerPelosi Our alternative #HR19 supports the innovation and research that saves lives – giving Americans the choice and control they want the affordability they need and the quality they deserve.
What a moving speech by my friend and colleague @RepRonWright! We need more stories like his not #fewercures like @SpeakerPelosi’s bill #HR3 would provide. https://t.co/CBWLP2xP7o
The NDAA provides @realDonaldTrump the tools needed to keep our nation safe. Read my full statement here: https://t.co/NvBSJGitfC

Today’s House passage of the #NDAA is vital to our national security. I am proud to vote for a bill that is so important to this country and to thousands of jobs in the metroplex — particularly in my district. https://t.co/xyTmu0BmVI
Couldn’t agree more @realDonaldTrump. Congratulations to my friend and fellow Texan @MacTXPress for negotiating such a great deal. Can’t wait to vote for it later today. https://t.co/ZB9zvKrWls

Today I joined 159 of my fellow Republicans urging @SpeakerPelosi to put our farmers and ranchers above politics and pass #USMCAnow. Remember $3.3 billion generated by trade with Canada and Mexico in Texas District 12 each year! https://t.co/eAmMiFMH69
@HouseAppropsGOP @realDonaldTrump This is deeply irresponsible.

@HouseAppropsGOP Instead of doing the work of the people Democrats are continuing a partisan attack that will consume our time and attention furthering their plan to remove the duly elected President @realDonaldTrump that began before he even took office. I repeat: before he even took office.

@HouseAppropsGOP Appropriations bills fund our national defense increase border security support affordable quality health care and much more! The Federal Government will shut down in 11 days if these bills aren’t signed into law.
As the lead Republican on @HouseAppropsGOP in charge of writing these bills we have been working for months to reach an agreement to responsibly fund our government.
When the House reconvenes today our sole focus should be on passing the bills that fund our government. Unfortunately Democrats remain consumed by political games.

Proud to be your voice in Washington working with @realDonaldTrump on policies that contribute to the Dallas-Fort Worth-Arlington area unemployment rate besting the national average with 3.1%! #JobsReport https://t.co/XzaEG6b1WM
266000 new jobs in November alone! Since @realDonaldTrump took office the #economy has gained 7 million jobs – 5.1 million MORE than projected. Great news for all Americans. https://t.co/830f03V2tA

Rebuilding the world’s smartest strongest national defense continues to drive a healthy economy in and around Texas District 12! Congratulations to @LockheedMartin and @BellFlight on aerospace innovations recognized by @PopSci’s “Best of What’s New” 2019. https://t.co/2lwR3Btlsx
Seventy-eight years ago our mighty nation was awakened at Pearl Harbor. Today we remember the brave men and women killed on that infamous day. #PearlHarborRemembranceDay https://t.co/wh0gYmOplN

Today House Democrats passed legislation that disproportionately criticizes Israel and seeks to undermine the Trump Administration’s efforts. As co-chair of the caucus to fight anti-Semitism I opposed this bill. I stand with #Israel and @realdonaldtrump.
We won’t stop fighting for #USMCA until it gets to @realDonaldTrump’s desk and signed into law. https://t.co/0cp9VhGjSA

Proud to join fellow Texas Members to rally around #USMCA today. This is vitally important to our nation the state of Texas and District 12 - especially so because trade with Canada and Mexico accounts for $3.3 billion a year in our district. #TexansForTrade #USMCANow https://t.co/xGyhMzijaG

Democrats in Congress need to stop their partisan witch-hunt and get back to the job hardworking taxpayers sent them here to do. Click here to read my full statement on Speaker Pelosi’s impeachment announcement: https://t.co/yRhnvqKsFM https://t.co/lKFn1M4Oux
Many of my interns continue on to full time jobs on Capitol Hill – like Loren (far left) who I was pleased to hire to serve as my new Staff Assistant in D.C.

Enjoyed spending time with three of my Washington interns today – Loren Courtney and Joaquim. I am lucky to have a bright ambitious group working with my staff this fall semester. If you or someone you know is interested in interning see here! https://t.co/qKvCkVobm0 https://t.co/0WkfyBQT33
It was great to speak with you @VP Pence and my GOP colleagues on the issues that matter most to Americans and Texans in District 12. https://t.co/arIEymDBYI

Fort Worth lost a true philanthropist remarkable businessman and dear friend last week. Happy Baggett dedicated his life to improving quality and access to early childhood development resources in North Texas. Happy strengthened our community. https://t.co/MKbIbEV79Q

Today is projected to be the busiest travel day of the year @DFWAirport! Just two years we celebrated the Airport Improvement Program’s announcement funding the TEXRail Commuter Line that connects Fort Worth to the airport. Safe travels everyone. https://t.co/fPolKBzdQX
Over the last year @samhsagov developed this website to help people easily find treatment for substance abuse. Please spread the word: https://t.co/vhpwM0QauV.

.@USNavy Region Southeast which includes our district's own @NASFortWorthJRB celebrates #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth by recalling the long and courageous history of Native Americans in the U.S. Armed Forces. Happy #NativeAmericanHeritageDay! https://t.co/3Y1aaQn5c6
#HappyThanksgiving to you and your family! I am grateful for the opportunity to serve our district and be your voice. https://t.co/IOfDqRISSR

As the holiday season brings families together it is important to remember those who cannot be home with us. Thank you to all deployed men and women making countless sacrifices to keep America safe. https://t.co/MtPdaoOpLf

�� Tarrant County Homeless Coalition links to dozens of local resources: https://t.co/mnwpQpJiSN @theTCHC   🥣 Tarrant Area Food Bank provides a search map for nearby food pantries: https://t.co/VW4jD7drtq @TAFoodBank

This week is National Hunger & Homelessness Awareness Week. We’re lucky to have many amazing partners in our district. As the days get cold let’s spread awareness about all the resources available to help. #HHWeek @HHWeek

Getting an up-close experience in our nation’s capital makes such an impact. If you’re planning a trip to Washington next year please remember my D.C. office can arrange tours of the White House Capitol Pentagon and more. Learn more here: https://t.co/YSOVSxHOC4 https://t.co/hwb8FRTiwB
Thank you to all brave men and women on the frontlines securing our border including @CBP and @USArmy. Our nation is a safer place because of your sacrifice and hard work. https://t.co/cAEWWBiF2B

Texas has the longest southern border stretch of any state. Protecting our border is imperative for the security and continued economic growth of our district state and nation. @realDonaldTrump knows this and is making strides! https://t.co/2qMHSD9ZN9

.@CBP apprehended over 35000 people illegally crossing the southern border in October alone. Border Patrol and the Office of Field Operations stopped nearly 800000 pounds of illicit drugs from crossing in 2019. https://t.co/OPdDlzWGOZ
I'm in El Paso getting an up-close look at the state of our southern border ensuring the wall is making good progress. https://t.co/9ApzDwD2O2

We hope both parties in the House and the Senate can work together putting politics aside to pass full-year appropriations measures that @realDonaldTrump can sign into law as quickly as possible. https://t.co/cPh7ZPKvv8
Did you know 95% of U.S. street drugs come through our southern border? NTCC agrees that securing the #border is a priority.

I had a productive conversation this week with the North Texas Crime Commission. This group helps keep our region safe by building partnerships between law enforcement the federal government citizens and educational institutions. https://t.co/uwpXKBLXC5
@PanCAN Please join my E-newsletter to receive these important updates by email: https://t.co/PqPU9f2jwN
Today on World #PancreaticCancer Day I invite you to read my newsletter about the disease's impact on our community and my commitment to progress: https://t.co/oZLTaY9Osl https://t.co/LSng33AZPO

The Texas Family Business Hall of Fame @Baylor added a Fort Worth legacy today. In 1940 the Renfros founded @MrsRenfros out of their garage. Today their children and grandchildren run the family business. What perfect news for #GlobalEntrepreneurshipWeek! https://t.co/ubpWkxRr4u https://t.co/aDml5RbRk3
@RepStefanik Instead of being consumed by a politically-driven impeachment inquiry the Democrats should focus on passing full-year appropriations bills to fund the government.

The partisan attacks by both Members and the media on my good friend @RepStefanik are shameful. I’m proud that she has stood strong in the pursuit of truth and firm in the face of these attacks. #TeamElise https://t.co/xekWG2OJ2E
Today’s bold action by @realDonaldTrump strengthens U.S. relations with our key ally Israel. Read the full announcement from @SecPompeo here: https://t.co/PtgGv6xrJA
Did you know @CityofFortWorth is offering small business workshops to celebrate Entrepreneurship Week? Learn more: https://t.co/8dTf8hTlzp

Small business drives a healthy economy and is a major contributor to the career opportunities within Texas District 12. That’s we celebrate #GlobalEntrepreneurshipWeek! As a former small business owner I know first hand just how rewarding and challenging it can be.

As we continue to honor U.S. veterans this month I feel privileged to know so many Fort Worth veterans. I recently met two such heroes Kelsey and Josh who told me about vital resources like @ATF_Tribe. I learn so much from my constituents including how I can best serve them. https://t.co/RT6VeTePc6

I’m proud to say the House passed several bills this week to support our nation’s veterans including the Veteran Entrepreneur Training Act. Through the @Boots2Business Program @SBAgov offers veterans and their spouses an entrepreneurship course!  https://t.co/UwpIjKrvAr

This week I was proud to vote for the “Rosie the Riveter Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2019” which is awarded to all women who joined the workforce during World War II and kept our nation running. To this day we are inspired by their spirit.

The effects of a continuing resolution could allow our enemies to gain a strategic advantage. As the Republican Leader of @HouseAppropsGOP I am working hard to negotiate a bipartisan full-year appropriations bill ensuring the Army has the resources to carry out their mission. https://t.co/gMvgRalxU7

I am working with senior military leaders to understand how a continuing resolution would impact their departments. @SecArmy McCarthy confirmed the military’s top priorities such as military readiness and troop morale are at risk if we don’t pass a full-year appropriations bill. https://t.co/OtcVKFGnbU
Great catching up with a close friend and fellow Texan on a variety of issues! @KayBaileyHutch https://t.co/BkjgJvkmlb
Raising awareness and funding for the critical mission of cancer research is always a priority. #PancAware https://t.co/tiFTJ6vQrZ

Great job by my friend and fellow Texan @RepRatcliffe at today’s impeachment hearing. https://t.co/hU4rEzlvpG

Big win for our veterans who live in rural areas! The House passed H.R. 4771 the VA Tele-Hearing Modernization Act. This common-sense reform allows #veterans to appear before the Board of Veterans’ Appeals remotely rather than in person to apply for their hard-earned benefits. https://t.co/J94Ly4J8lt

I was honored to participate in Sunday’s “Welcome Home” service for Vietnam veterans at Lakeside Church of God. It was a homecoming many never got with music cheers and more than a few tears. Today as we honor all our military I say thank you and Happy #VeteransDay2019. https://t.co/SomSaSjPTN

Happy Birthday to the @USMC! I have two amazing Marines on staff in my district office. I am thankful for them and for all current and former service members of the Corps. #HappyBirthdayMarines https://t.co/5sKLawnU7N

Today I had the pleasure of interviewing these outstanding high school students in Texas District 12 who are vying for congressional nominations to our fine service academies. I wish I could nominate every one of you. You are among the finest young people in the nation. https://t.co/9Z1tX59ZrR

It's the start of a fantastic weekend celebrating our nation's veterans! Did you know Tarrant County has a parade on Monday? Share your #VeteransDay2019 plans and stories about the veterans who inspire you this weekend.  Parade details: https://t.co/5yb5IlEMqQ
I’m filled with pride seeing generations come together as young students honor veterans this month. Schools around the district kicked off #VeteransDay2019 early today! https://t.co/FDyyT5Aq3P

It was a pleasure to see so many young people display a passion for civic engagement tonight through @SteerFW. Such purpose and promise from the emerging leaders of Fort Worth! #CivicEngagement https://t.co/D6ogsbmlHF

I was honored to receive the Railroad Achievement Award today in Fort Worth. The U.S. railroad network is imperative to the health of our national and local economies. To be recognized for this work means the world to me! Thank you @AAR_FreightRail and @GORail. https://t.co/j1T2Nr93jl

It’s fantastic to see the local community supporting our veterans. I take great pride in the services my office provides to help veterans connect with their hard-earned benefits and I am always excited to see more resources in Fort Worth. Learn more about the November 8 fair! https://t.co/Iwz68VtytN

Each of us has been touched by breast cancer whether personally or through friends and family. I am proud to champion groups that provide early detection and patient services and I am proud of all Susan G. Komen #The3Day walkers in DFW today.   https://t.co/A09uLpMj0G @The3Day

Did you know that I have experts in my office who can help with issues you may be having with federal agencies? From social security and veterans benefits to navigating tax problems my staff and I are here to help you cut through the red tape. https://t.co/DyW6eru7CT

Instead of legitimizing the inquiry as Democrats claim the #ImpeachmentResolution makes an already broken and secretive process even worse and I voted NO. For more: https://t.co/yRhnvqKsFM https://t.co/JYaoUlU3P6

The @TheJusticeDept recently announced that both @LakeWorthISD and @WeatherfordISD were awarded grants to prevent school violence. The grants totaling nearly $600000 fund mental health programs threat assessments and technological advancements. Go Bullfrogs and go Roos!
